name: Rip Space-Time
rulesText: Rip Space-Time deals 5 damage to target unit or player and 2 damage to you.

name: Rocket Salvo
rulesText:
Rocket Salvo deals 2 damage to target unit.
Rocket Salvo deals 4 damage to that unit instead if you control three or more devices.

name: Scrapyard Salvager
rulesText: 3R, Sacrifice a device: Create two 1/1 colorless Mech device unit tokens.

name: Selfdestruct Sequence
rulesText:
As an additional cost to issue Selfdestruct Sequence, sacrifice a device.
Destroy target device.

name: Slagthrower
rulesText: R, T, Sacrifice a device: Slagthrower deals 2 damage to target unit or player. Activate this ability only any time you could issue a strategy.

name: Slipstream Hunters
rulesText:
First strike
Other device units you control have first strike.
Tap two untapped devices you control: Slipstream Hunters deals 1 damage to target player.

name: Speed Demon
rulesText:
Haste
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Speed Demon unless you sacrifice a device.

name: Supervolcanic Fallout
rulesText:
Supervolcanic Fallout deals 3 damage to each player.
Displace up to three target units your opponents control. (Dematerialise those units. Return them to the battlefield under their owners’ control at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Supply Runner
rulesText: Whenever Supply Runner deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Equipment device token. It has “Equipped unit gets +1/+1,” and equip 1.

name: Threaten
rulesText: Untap target unit and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.

name: Unstable Nanoreplicators
rulesText: You may have Unstable Nanoreplicators enter the battlefield as a copy of any unit on the battlefield except it gains trample, haste, and “At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this unit,” and is a device in addition to its other types.

name: Vulcan Devastators
rulesText: Sacrifice a device: Vulcan Devastators gains haste until end of turn.

name: Walking Furnace
rulesText: Sacrifice two devices: Add RR to your psi cache. Activate this ability only once each turn.

name: Warapur Company Duo
rulesText:
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Technician (Whenever you issue a nonunit order, this unit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

name: Warapur Company Flagship
rulesText:
Flying
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Sacrifice three devices: Warapur Company Flagship deals 4 damage to target unit or player.

name: Warapur Company Heavy
rulesText:
Trample
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Whenever Warapur Company Heavy attacks, sacrifice any number of devices. Warapur Company Heavy gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each device sacrificed this way.

name: Week of Hate
rulesText: After the first postcombat main phase on each of your turns, there’s an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all units that attacked this turn.

name: Wild Game Huntmaster
rulesText:
Haste
When Wild Game Huntmaster enters the battlefield, for each Equipment on the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech Hound device unit token with haste and you may attach that Equipment to it.

name: Beast of Burden
rulesText: Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, that unit gains trample until end of turn.

name: Bioarchitect
rulesText: Sacrifice Bioarchitect: Activate an activated ability of target permanent you control up to two times without paying its costs.

name: Biosample Courier
rulesText: Whenever another unit falls, put a +1/+1 counter on Biosample Courier and Biosample Courier gains cloaking until end of turn. (It can’t be the target of orders or protocols your opponents control.)

name: Brood Ambush
rulesText: Create two 1/1 green Mutant unit tokens, then you may sacrifice a unit. If you do, create a 1/1 green Mutant unit token.

name: Chase Down
rulesText: Target unit you control that entered the battlefield this turn gains haste until end of turn and deals damage equal to its power to up to one other target unit.

name: Deep into the Subconscious
rulesText:
Target unit you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of units you control. 
Coordinate — Return it to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step unless you control five or more units.

name: Defense Protocols
rulesText: If you control fewer than five units, create a number of 1/1 green Mutant unit tokens equal to the difference.

name: Dominate
rulesText:
You may dematerialise Dominate as you draw it if you control a Forest.
As long as Dominate is dematerialised, when a unit you control becomes the target of an order or ability, issue Dominate without paying its psi cost.
Target unit gets +3/+3 and gains cloaking until end of turn.

name: Ecosystem Collapse
rulesText:
Choose one or more —
• Destroy target device.
• Destroy target development.
• Destroy target land.
• Destroy target organization.

name: Escaped Test Subject
rulesText: 5G: All units able to intercept Escaped Test Subject this turn do so.

name: Experiment T.I.T.A.N.
rulesText: Coordinate — When Experiment T.I.T.A.N. enters the battlefield, if you control five or more units, target unit you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Then you may have that unit fight target unit you don’t control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Extraterrestrial Exploration
rulesText: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Failed Kushak Subject
rulesText:
Trample, cloaking
Failed Kushak Subject enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Failed Kushak Subject deals combat damage to a player, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

name: Frontier Anatomist
rulesText: Whenever another unit enters the battlefield under your control, that unit gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Genome Toggle
rulesText: Sacrifice any number of units. Create a 6/6 green Mutant unit token for each unit sacrificed this way.

name: Gestation Cycle
rulesText:
Modify unit
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on modified unit.
When modified unit leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Mutant unit token for each +1/+1 counter on that unit.

name: Growth Genetics
rulesText:
Modify unit
Modified unit gets +5/+5 and has mutate. (When it falls, its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a unit card that costs less. That player puts that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of his or her library in a random order.)

name: Incubation Hulk
rulesText: When Incubation Hulk falls, create three 2/2 green Mutant unit tokens with “When this unit falls, create three 1/1 green Mutant unit tokens.”

name: The Kishar
rulesText:
Flying, trample
Prevent all combat damage that units without flying or reach would deal to The Kishar.
Whenever The Kishar enters the battlefield or attacks, create three 1/1 green Mutant unit tokens.

name: Kushak Artifact
rulesText: Whenever a nontoken unit you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay its psi cost and sacrifice it. If you do, create two tokens that are copies of that unit.

name: Kushak Brood Warden
rulesText: 2, T, Sacrifice a unit: Create two 1/1 green Mutant unit tokens.

name: Kushak Research Team
rulesText:
Each other unit you control that’s a Mutant or a Xeno gets +1/+1 and has mutate.
Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Kushak Testing Facility
rulesText:
+1: Create a 1/1 green Mutant unit token.
-5: Destroy target device or development. Create X 1/1 green Mutant unit tokens, where X is that permanent’s converted psi cost.
-5: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Mutant unit you control for each Mutant unit you control.

name: Lifestrider
rulesText:
T: Add one psi of any color to your psi cache.
Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Lone Wanderer
rulesText:
When Lone Wanderer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech device unit token.
Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, units you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Mutagenic Serum
rulesText:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target unit.
Whenever a unit enters the battlefield under your control during an opponent’s turn, return Mutagenic Serum from your trashpile to your hand.

name: Myth of Baljurashi
rulesText:
When Myth of Baljurashi enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Neural Suppressor
rulesText:
Trample, cloaking
Neural Suppressor enters the battlefield with three suppression counters on it.
Remove a suppression counter from Neural Suppressor: Counter target activated ability or triggered ability. (Psi abilities can’t be targeted.)

name: Radium Tracker
rulesText: Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Reverse Gravity
rulesText: Until end of turn, each unit you control without flying gets +2/+2 and gains trample and each unit you don’t control with flying can’t intercept units without flying.

name: SAM Team
rulesText:
Flash
Reach

name: Screeching Terror
rulesText: When Screeching Terror enters the battlefield, units you control gain menace until end of turn. (They can’t be intercepted except by two or more units.)

name: Sewer Monster
rulesText:
Each unit you sacrifice while issuing Sewer Monster reduces its cost by 2.
Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Sewer Unit
rulesText: When Sewer Unit enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech device unit token. If a unit fell this turn, create two of those tokens instead.

name: Strongarm Tactics
rulesText:
Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target units.
Target unit gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Untap target unit. That unit gains reach until end of turn.

name: Supply Scavengers
rulesText: Coordinate — Supply Scavengers gets +2/+2 as long as you control five or more units.

name: Support Team
rulesText:
Flash
When Support Team enters the battlefield, you may pay 1. If you do, target unit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Terraforming Works
rulesText: 4GG, Sacrifice a land: Create a 6/6 green Mutant unit token.

name: Ultramagnetic Interference
rulesText:
Destroy up to one target device or development.
Up to one target unit you control gains protection from devices and from developments until end of turn.

name: Unstable Growth
rulesText: Up to two target units each get +2/+2 and gain cloaking and vigilance until end of turn.

name: Urban Ravager
rulesText:
Flash
As Urban Ravager enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of units. Urban Ravager enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Wanderer Caravans
rulesText: Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, that unit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: High Judge Zephynius
rulesText: Units your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped and have “This unit doesn’t untap during your untap step” and “At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2. If you do, untap this unit.”

name: Wings of the Law
rulesText:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever a card is dematerialised, put a +1/+1 counter on Wings of the Law.

name: Twilight Strider
rulesText:
Furtive (Whenever this unit attacks with exactly one other unit, it can’t be intercepted this turn.)
At the beginning of each end step, if a player lost life this turn, untap Twilight Strider and each opponent loses 1 life.

name: Whisper, the Cleaner
rulesText:
Furtive (Whenever this unit attacks with exactly one other unit, it can’t be intercepted this turn.)
Whenever Whisper, the Cleaner deals combat damage to a player, choose one —
• That player discards a card.
• You draw a card.

name: Thousand Spares
rulesText: Sacrifice another device: Thousand Spares gains indestructible and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Thousand Spares’s power.

name: Warapur Protection Service
rulesText:
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Sacrifice a device: Warapur Protection Service deals 1 damage to each opponent.

name: Canyon Skitterer
rulesText: Whenever you issue a tactic or strategy, if that tactic or strategy targets only Canyon Skitterer, you may copy it up to two times. You may choose new targets for the copies.

name: Honored Wurmcaller
rulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 5/5 red and green legendary unit token named Shaitan. It has haste and trample.

name: Ingolf, the Catalyst
rulesText: Whenever another unit enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each unit you control.

name: Rooftop Misdirector
rulesText: When Rooftop Misdirector enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Hologram device unit token for each other unit you control.

name: Publicity Officer
rulesText: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained or lost life this turn, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (Gaining life doesn’t count against losing life.)

name: Representative Vuissance
rulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
T, Pay 1 life: Draw a card.

name: Gravitic Collector Alpha

Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that units without flying or reach would deal to Gravitic Collector Alpha.
At the beginning of your upkeep, target unit you control gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

rulesText:
Flying
2, Tap an untapped device you control: Target device unit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulesText: 3, Dematerialise a unit card from your trashpile: Put a +1/+1 counter on Sewer Dredgers. You gain 1 life and draw a card.

rulesText:
Lethality (Any amount of damage this deals to a unit is enough to destroy it.)
Mutate, mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal two unit cards that cost less. Put those cards onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Agent Magpie

Double strike
Whenever Agent Magpie deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Equipment device token attached to Agent Magpie. It has “Equipped unit gets +1/+1,” and equip 1.

rulesText: Equipped units you control get +1/+1.

rulesText:
Untap all lands you control during each other player’s untap step.
You may issue orders as though they had flash.

name: Troposphere Drifter
rulesText:
Flash
Flying
Whenever you issue an order, Troposphere Drifter gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that order’s converted psi cost.
